trans-unit.source: Serves as the base class for design-time data source view classes.

The following code example shows how to create a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView> object along with a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceViewSchema> class and two custom <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceFieldSchema> classes.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo crear una personalizada <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView> objeto junto con un personalizado <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceViewSchema> clase y personaliza dos <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceFieldSchema> clases.

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger sample for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: Este ejemplo forma parte de un ejemplo más extenso para el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> clase.

trans-unit.source: When you inherit from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView" /> class, you must override the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView.GetDesignTimeData(System.Int32,System.Boolean@)" /> method either to create sample data that conforms to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView.Schema" /> property, or to return real data from the data source.
trans-unit.target: Al heredar de la <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView" /> (clase), es necesario reemplazar el <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView.GetDesignTimeData(System.Int32,System.Boolean@)" /> método cualquiera para crear datos de ejemplo que se ajustan a la <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView.Schema" /> propiedad, o para devolver datos reales del origen de datos.

trans-unit.source: The parent data source designer.
The name of the view in the data source.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView" /> class using the specified data source designer and view name.
<paramref name="owner" /> is <see langword="null" />
-or-
<paramref name="viewName" /> is <see langword="null" />.

Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView" /> object that is associated with the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl" /> object supports the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteDelete(System.Collections.IDictionary,System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method.

<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteDelete(System.Collections.IDictionary,System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method is supported; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si se admite el método <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteDelete(System.Collections.IDictionary,System.Collections.IDictionary)" />; de lo contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView" /> object that is associated with the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl" /> object supports the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteInsert(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteInsert(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method is supported; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si se admite el método <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteInsert(System.Collections.IDictionary)" />; de lo contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView" /> object that is associated with the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl" /> object supports paging through the data that is retrieved by the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect(System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments)" /> method.

<see langword="true" /> if paging through the data retrieved by the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect(System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments)" /> method is supported; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si se admite la paginación de los datos que recupera el método <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteSelect(System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments)" />; en caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView" /> object that is associated with the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl" /> object supports retrieving the total number of data rows instead of the data itself.
<see langword="true" /> if retrieving the total number of data rows is supported; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si admite la recuperación del número total de filas de datos; de lo contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView" /> object that is associated with the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl" /> object supports a sorted view on the underlying data source.
<see langword="true" /> if a sorted view on the underlying data source is supported; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si se admite una vista ordenada en el origen de datos subyacente; de lo contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView" /> object that is associated with the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl" /> object supports the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteUpdate(System.Collections.IDictionary,System.Collections.IDictionary,System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method.

<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteUpdate(System.Collections.IDictionary,System.Collections.IDictionary,System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method is supported; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si se admite el método <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteUpdate(System.Collections.IDictionary,System.Collections.IDictionary,System.Collections.IDictionary)" />; de lo contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the designer that created this <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView" /> control.
The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner" /> object provided when the current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView" /> instance was created.
trans-unit.target: El <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner" /> objeto proporcionado al actual <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView" /> se creó la instancia.

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of rows to return.
<see langword="true" /> to indicate that the returned data is sample data; <see langword="false" /> to indicate that the returned data is live data.
Generates design-time data that matches the schema of the associated data source control using the specified number of rows, indicating whether it is returning sample data or real data.
A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView" /> object containing data to display at design time.

For a complete example of using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView.GetDesignTimeData%2A> method with views, schemas, and a data source designer, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener un ejemplo completo del uso de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView.GetDesignTimeData%2A> método con vistas, esquemas y un diseñador de origen de datos, vea <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the view as provided when this instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView" /> class was created.
The view name.
Gets a schema that describes the data source view that is represented by this view object.
An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceViewSchema" /> object.

For a complete example of using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView.Schema%2A> method with views, schemas, and a data source designer, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener un ejemplo completo del uso de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView.Schema%2A> método con vistas, esquemas y un diseñador de origen de datos, vea <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner>.
